name: Little One...
description:
I've been making educational games for a few years with a focus around cyber security education. I wanted to participate in this (my first) Game Jam, to try out some new ideas and see what was possible in a weekend.

I'm a solo game maker and decided for this project that I would try and use only assets that I have made and have created within this 48 hour window. Happy to say that I managed to create 95% of the assets you see in 'Little One' within this Jam period.

Big thank you to the organisers of this Game Jam!
